p: The experiments were performed at the Phytopathology Laboratory of the Gurupi Campus, Federal University of Tocantins (UFT), in the state of Tocantins, Brazil. C. lunata was initially isolated from the maize leaves derived from the experimental field of UFT with the diseasesâ€™ symptoms, and put in a PDA (Potato, Dextrose, Agar) culture environment.
